attributes.action: Ask the UN to act more strongly in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom should be applying pressure so that the UN to acts to ask for international moderators to adjudicate the Zimbawean election to ensure the vote is fair.

Should Zanu PF refuse, then the UN should be prepared to use peacekeeping forces to ensure a fair vote, where voters are not harrassed and can feel safe, but which can still re-elect the Zanu PF should this be the choice of the Zimbabwean people
